parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Host the mp mission described by config class. Should be called as reaction to some UI action in some dialog.<br>
For example you can start a MP scenario from a button. It creates a host and takes you to the lobby with the scenario loaded.<br>
You need to provide the display which is active when the hostMission command is called. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[hostMission]] [pConfig, pDisplay]  </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pConfig, pDisplay]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pConfig: [[Config]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pDisplay: [[Display]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hostMission]] [configMissionName, display];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hostMission]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[configFile]] >> "CfgMissions" >> "MPMissions" >> _scenarioClassName, _currentlyActiveDisplay];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> '''<template><title>arma3</title></template>:''' Launch host mission dialog from a client on dedicated server:
<code>[[hostMission]] [
	[[configFile]] >> "CfgMissions" >> "MPmissions" >> "MP_COOP_m01",
	[[findDisplay]] 46
];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[playScriptedMission]], [[playMission]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">

<dd class="note">
The command must be called in the main menu or something similar menu it seems.
